ACA_Performance_DisableSessionAffinity.explanation: Azure Container Apps should be deployed with session affinity disabled for better performance. See: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/container-apps/sticky-sessions?pivots=azure-portal

ACA_Private_DisableExternalIngress.explanation: Azure Container Apps should be deployed with external ingress disabled for better security. See: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/container-apps/ingress-overview

ACA_Security_DisableInsecureIngress.explanation: Azure Container Apps should be deployed with insecure ingress disabled for better security. See: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/container-apps/ingress-how-to
